ranked_differential_diagnosis.label: Active Chronic Otitis Media (Right Ear)
ranked_differential_diagnosis.rationale_short: Presence of white otorrhea, otalgia, and mixed hearing loss in the context of prior tympanomastoidectomy.

ranked_differential_diagnosis.label: Mixed Hearing Loss (Bilateral)
ranked_differential_diagnosis.rationale_short: Bilateral air-bone gaps and history of chronic ear disease and surgeries (tympanomastoidectomy/tympanoplasty).

ordered_list.rationale_short: To assess degree, type, and configuration of hearing loss given reported progression.
To evaluate speech reception thresholds and word recognition abilities.
To assess middle ear function, though measurement may be limited by surgical history.

expected_interpretations_by_visit.collective_interpretation: Audiologic evaluation reveals asymmetric bilateral mixed hearing loss, worse in the right ear, consistent with the history of chronic ear disease and surgeries. Speech recognition is good bilaterally. Immittance testing was not possible due to altered ear canal anatomy from previous surgeries.

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.result_summary: Right ear: Moderate to moderately severe mixed loss (250-500 Hz), rising to moderate (1-2 kHz), sloping to severe mixed loss (3-8 kHz). Left ear: Moderate rising to slight mixed loss (250-1000 Hz), sloping to mild SNHL (2-3 kHz), then moderately severe mixed loss (4-8 kHz). Air-bone gaps present bilaterally.

tests.name: Speech audiometry
tests.result_summary: SRT: Right 52 dB HL, Left 28 dB HL (consistent with PTA). WRS: Right 84% at 80 dB HL, Left 84% at 65 dB HL.

tests.name: Tympanometry
tests.result_summary: Could not be measured due to previous otosurgery.

proposed_items: Medical treatment for right ear infection (medication provided)
counseling_actions: Advise on importance of medication compliance for ear infection
Discuss need for medical clearance before pursuing hearing aids
Counsel on hearing protection due to dizziness and history of ear disease

escalation.rationale_short: Active infection with drainage, dizziness, and history of chronic ear disease requires immediate medical management.

follow_up_plan.objective: Medical follow-up to check infection status and consider further surgery.
